rBackup 0.1.0

Backup CRAN and Bioconductor Packages

Source: R/backup_cran.R
backup_cran_packages.Rd

Download and backup R packages from CRAN and Bioconductor, creating source package archives for offline installation.

Usage

backup_cran_packages(
  package_list,
  backup_dir = "cran_backup",
  max_size_mb = 100,
  include_deps = FALSE,
  progress = TRUE
)

Arguments

package_list

Character vector of package names

backup_dir

Directory to store backups (default: "cran_backup")

max_size_mb

Maximum file size in MB (larger files will be skipped)

include_deps

Logical, whether to include dependencies

progress

Logical, whether to show progress messages

Value

A data frame with backup results including source, version, and status

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Backup CRAN packages
packages <- c("ggplot2", "dplyr", "tidyr")
result <- backup_cran_packages(packages)

# Include Bioconductor packages
bio_packages <- c("limma", "edgeR", "DESeq2")
bio_result <- backup_cran_packages(bio_packages, include_deps = TRUE)
} # }
